channel.title: Weird colors on eyes, weapons and acid.
channel.description:
Hello. I'm new to these forums. I have encountered some issues that I would like to fix. Here's a link to some images: [url]https://imgur.com/a/CNefs[/url]
NPC eyes and weapons are purple with black squares. Also a line apeared across the screen and I don't know how to remove it. I've tried uninstalling the game and installing and nothing.

item.title: Weird colors on eyes, weapons and acid.
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
yeah, -dxlevel 90 fixed it for me.

Read full topic
item.source: Weird colors on eyes, weapons and acid.

item.title: Weird colors on eyes, weapons and acid.
item.dc:creator: billiam
item.description:
-dxlevel 90 in the steam launch options might help

Read full topic
